document_data.name: Tamura Tenryu
document_data.mainbody: '''Tamura Tenryu''' was a [[samurai]] of [[Fochu Peninsula]] in [[Wa]] around [[1358 DR]].
document_data.Activities: Tamura Tenryu was the [[shoya]] of the village of [[Ayoi]] in Fochu Peninsula.
document_data.Personality: Tenryu considered himself superior to the local villagers and had a desperate need for an intelligent conversation. He pressed all his guests to attend an incense ceremony before being welcomed in the village.
